org.codemonkey.util
Interface DatagramEncoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerMessageToClient
public interface DatagramEncoder

Interface for marking objects encodable as datagram. An encoded strings is a string that contains a number that denotes the length of a value followed by the value itself.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Benny Bottema

Method Summary
 String encode()
          Creates a response string (binary packet) of the current server response.
 

Method Detail

encode

String encode()
Creates a response string (binary packet) of the current server response. It does not know the response code, which is assigned externally and prepended to the response string created by this method.

Returns:
The response String or binary packet, without the response code.
